name: Young Brass Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks with its bite and twice with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Molten Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales molten glass in a 40-foot-long  5-foot-wide line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 38 (11d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Sleep Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  a creature falls unconscious for 10 minutes or until it takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

special_abilities.name: Self-Sufficient
special_abilities.desc: The brass dragon can subsist on only a quart of water and a pound of food per day.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:comprehend languages,
